import { finalId } from '../ProductList/ProductListContainer' import style from './ProductPage.module.css' const ProductPage = (props) => { console.log(props.nft) const index = props.nft.findIndex(el => el.id == finalId) return (

Card #{props.nft[index].id}

NFT: {props.nft[index].name}

Amount: {props.nft[index].amount} pcs

Price: {props.nft[index].price}$

Size:

Width: {props.nft[index].size.width}mm

Height: {props.nft[index].size.height}mm

{ props.confirmDelete &&
}
) } export default ProductPage;
